quiz.question: What is the primary purpose of OS updates?
quiz.explanation: OS updates often include security patches that protect your device from vulnerabilities.

quiz.question: How can you enable automatic updates on your device?

options.text: By checking for updates manually every week
By going to Settings > System > Software update and enabling auto-update

quiz.explanation: Enabling auto-update ensures that your device receives the latest security patches automatically.

quiz.question: What should you do if you see an update notice?

options.text: Install it to keep your device secure
Only install if it has new features
Ask a friend if they have installed it

quiz.explanation: Installing updates is crucial for maintaining the security and functionality of your device.
